query: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.role, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adminPermissions ap WHERE ap.userId = u.id) as has_perm FROM users u WHERE u.role IN ('admin', 'super_admin', 'staff_admin');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user XTqR3P9v8tSgKnm.root --database jHCPjtWAoWrQh3F8kPBEFC --execute SELECT u.id, u.username, u.role, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adminPermissions ap WHERE ap.userId = u.id) as has_perm FROM users u WHERE u.role IN ('admin', 'super_admin', 'staff_admin');
